data.title: Master Class Program – The American French Film Festival in Los Angeles
data.text:
Masterclasses are held upon request on campuses across Los Angeles county in partnership with ELMA and with the support of Villa Albertine .

In 2022 Masterclasses were held at:

Chapman University

Screening of Everybody Loves Jeanne followed by a conversation with writer/director CELINE DEVAUX

Pasadena City College

Screening of NADIA followed by a conversation with writer/director ANISSA BONEFONT

UCLA

Screening of Once In A Lifetime followed by a conversation with writer/director MARIE-CASTILLE MENTION-SCHAAR

To schedule a masterclass

Please contact Anouchka Van Riel at school.theusfrenchfilmfest@gmail.com to schedule a masterclass with one of our filmmakers invited.

2019 MASTERCLASSES

IN SAFE HANDS (Pupille) with writer/director Jeanne Herry

THE INSIDE GAME (Jeux D’Influence) with writer/director Jean-Xavier de Lestrade

2018 MASTERCLASS

CHATEAU (La Vie de Château) with writer/director Cédric Ido

2017 MASTERCLASSES

A KID (Le Fils De Jean) with writer/director Philippe Lioret

SLACK BAY (Ma Loute) with writer/director Bruno Dumont

2016 MASTERCLASSES

COME WHAT MAY (En Mai, Fais Ce Qu’Il Te Plait) with writer/director Christian Carion

DON’T TELL ME THE BOY WAS MAD (Une Histoire De Fou) with writer/director Robert Guédiguian

2015 MASTERCLASSES

THE LAST HAMMER BLOW (Le Dernier Coup De Marteau) with writer/director Alix Delaporte

GEMMA BOVERY with writer/director Anne Fontaine

2014 MASTERCLASSES

WE LOVE YOU, YOU BASTARD (Salaud, On t’aime!) with writer/director/producer Claude Lelouch

SUZANNE with writer/director Katell Quillévéré

2013 MASTERCLASSES

THE MAN WHO LAUGHS (L’Homme Qui Rit) with writer/director Jean-Pierre Ameris

2012 MASTERCLASSES

38 WITNESSES (38 Témoins) with writer/director Lucas Belvaux
